column1: # Paper Benchmark: Humphrey et al. 2023 — N. gaditana Bacteriome
# Sequencing: Zymo ZymoBIOMIC 16S service, V3-V4 (CCTACGGGGNGGCWGCAG / GACTACHVGGGTATCTAATCC)
# Date extracted: 2026-02-19 from PMC full text
# PURPOSE: Ground truth for validating pipeline results on public Nannochloropsis data.
# Any 16S pipeline run on Nannochloropsis outdoor cultures should detect a SUBSET of
# these genera (not all — different strains/settings will have different communities).
# The pipeline is validated if it can taxonomically resolve to genus level and detect
# Columns: rank, otu_name, taxonomy_level, role, relative_abundance_category, notes

column6: NOT native to bacteriome; pathogen tested
